ygData.subject: Still waiting on Crier's MM advice, but now I have a new question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Well, lately I ve come to a bit of a dilema. Tehre s just too much that I want to be doing. So I come to ask how you have your hot keys arranged.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

Well, lately I've come to a bit of a dilema. Tehre's just too much that I
want to be doing. So I come to ask how you have your hot keys arranged.
Lately I've just not had enough space in my banks for all the buttons I
desire.

here's my current set up...

1) Travel
1. Forage
2. Sense Heading
3. Song slot 8
4. Song slot 4
5. Song slot 6
6. /follow hotkey

2) Inventory
1. Inventory slot 3
2. Inventory slot 4
3. Melee slot 1
4. Melee slot 2
5. Inventory slot 5
6. Inventory slot 6

3) Group Battle
1. Song slot 1
2. Song slot 2
3. Song slot 3
4. Song slot 4
5. Song slot 5
6. Song slot 6

4) Solo Battle
1. Song slot 7
2. Song slot 2
3. Song slot 5
4. Song slot 6
5. Melee slot 1
6. Melee slot 2

5) Misc.
1. Sit
2. Camp
3. Spells
4. Song slot 7
5. Corpse
6. Walk / Run

6) Misc. non hunting functions
1. Forage
2. Fishing
3. Sneak
4. Song slot 4
5. (Social key set up to invite party members)
6. Hide

My song selection changes with the hour, but here is my most recent
selection for fighting in a tank heavy group in sol a:
1. Kellin's Lucid Lullaby
2. Psalm of Warmth
3. Anthem of Arms
4. Crisson's Pixie Strike (when out doors this becomes Selo's)
5. Selo's Consonant Chain
6. Hymn of Restoration (usually constant)
7. Angstilch's Appalling Screech
8. Shaurii's Sonorus Clouding

What I would like is to have a permenant bank set up for charming, so that I
can work with charm more. I would also like to be able to make room for
Instill Doubt on a regular combat palatte as well as room for tracking which
I get in 5 levels.

Any advice?

Draelon Stormsong
Bard of the 30th measure
the Tribunal
